name: Shovel Knight: Zx spectrum Demake prototype
name_original: Shovel Knight: Zx spectrum Demake prototype
description:
A (very rough) early prototype of a shovel knight demake in the style of a zx spectrum game. Intended to look and play like the classic crappy pc ports that you love to hate of your favorite nes games. Remember megaman on dos? Yeah, like that.

Credits:
